About me

I am M M Abid Naziri, also known as M M Abid Naziri. I graduated from the University of Dhaka in 2018 with a Bachelor of Science degree in Computer Science and Engineering. I am currently working as a Senior Software Engineer at Enosis Solutions. I work with several desktop applications written primarily in Delphi, with other desktop applications and web apps involving technologies like ASP.NET Core, React JS etc.
